TextLibrary.Text: I met a man called Sly McGee. Says he is ex-Trident officer. Will help us for a price.
I met a man called Sly McGee. Says he is ex-Trident officer. Will help us for a price.
Needs Solenite Ore from Solis Mine. Very rare! Must get him some.
